Connection.Error.message: An error occurred while connecting to the API.

Settings.Connection.APIConnected.message: You are connected to the API and recieving events

Settings.Connection.APIDisconnected.message: You are not connected to the API are not recieving events.

Settings.Connection.APIDisconnectedDesc.message: You should be automatically reconnected when the API becomes available, if you wish to reconnect manually you can try use the button below. For more information about why you're not connected, check /xllog

Settings.Connection.NotLoggedIn.message: You must log in to a character to connect to the API

Settings.Connections.Log.Desc.message: You will see friend events in the log below when you recieve them.

Settings.HideSameFC.Tooltip.message: When enabled, you will not be notified when a friend in your free company logs in or out.

Settings.NotificationType.Tooltip.message: The place to display notifications when a friend logs in or logs out.

Settings.LoginMessage.Tooltip.message:
The message to show when a friend logs in.

{0}: Name of the friend.

Settings.LogoutMessage.Tooltip.message:
The message to show when a friend logs out.

{0}: Name of the friend.

Settings.FriendshipCode.Hint.message: Leave empty to send notifications to all friends

Settings.FriendshipCode.Tooltip.message: Your friend code determines which friends you send and recieve notifications with.

Settings.SaltMode.Tooltip.message:
Strict: Validation is done using both Friend Code & Plugin Assembly
Relaxed: Validation is done using Friend Code

Keep this on strict if you are not having any issues

Settings.APIURL.Tooltip.message: The API that all events will be sent to and recieved from. Changes do not apply until the plugin has been reloaded.
